title: Language Communication Competency Enhancement Program Based on Attitude Change

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational understanding of cultural diversity
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining asynchronous collaboration via smartphone apps with monthly offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflict cases occurring in multicultural situations and propose three or more dialogue strategies reflecting open attitudes
Learners can recognize unconscious biases in language use and create two or more communication scenarios reflecting cultural sensitivity
Learners can establish and implement language habit improvement plans by applying the 5-stage model of attitude change

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
